name: BetterYou
0:
”Alexa, ask Better You for today's lesson”
”Alexa, ask Better You for life hack”
”Alexa, ask Better You for today's tip”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: better you
des:
Better You skill makes your dream of having a funny life coach in your pocket, oh wait, speaker, a reality (Gosh, why would you dream of that?). 

Nevertheless, Better You skills provides you a new science - backed life tip, hack or lesson everyday in domains such as work, relationships, health, tech and a lot more. Talk to Better You every 24 hours to discover new lesson that will help you become a better and smarter version of yourself.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
